scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w graphql -w ../backend-modules -w src -w lib -w modules -w .env -w package.json -w server.js -w index.js index.js
scripts.db:reset:noseeds: node script/db-migrate-all.js reset && node script/db-migrate-all.js up
scripts.db:reset: yarn run db:reset:noseeds && yarn run db:seed
scripts.translations: yarn run translations:local && yarn run translations:crowdfunding
scripts.link:backend-modules: yarn link apollo-modules-node && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-auth && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-base && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-documents && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-mail && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-translate && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-scalars && yarn link @orbiting/backend-modules-scripts
scripts.unlink:backend-modules: yarn unlink apollo-modules-node && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-auth && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-base && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-documents && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-mail && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-translate && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-scalars && yarn unlink @orbiting/backend-modules-scripts
